CORBParameters Struct Reference

#include <VLIB_orb.h>

Detailed Description

Structure defining various parameters required by the ORB functions.

Definition at line 169 of file VLIB_orb.h.

Data Fields

int32_t width
int32_t height
int32_t marginPixels
uint8_t fastDifferenceThreshold
int32_t n_features_desired

Field Documentation

int32_t CORBParameters::width

Width of the input image. Must be a multiple of 8, aligned in memory by 8, and greater than 120.

Definition at line 170 of file VLIB_orb.h.

int32_t CORBParameters::height

Height of the input image. Must be a multiple of 8, aligned in memory by 8, and greater than 120.

Definition at line 171 of file VLIB_orb.h.

int32_t CORBParameters::marginPixels

(35 is safe). Due to the size of the rBRIEF features, border effects on Harris, etc, we should not extract features right by the image border.

Definition at line 172 of file VLIB_orb.h.

uint8_t CORBParameters::fastDifferenceThreshold

The threshold for fast corner detection. 20 is a reasonable value for 0->255 data.

Definition at line 174 of file VLIB_orb.h.

int32_t CORBParameters::n_features_desired

Number of features to extract rBRIEF descriptors. A few hundred is a reasonable number.

Definition at line 178 of file VLIB_orb.h.
